keywords: TfL,Contactless app, oyster app, oyster card, contactless card
description: The free TfL Oyster and contactless app lets you top up and manage your contactless and Oyster cards on the go.

breadcrumbs.title: How to pay and where to buy tickets and Oyster

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Our free app lets you manage your contactless and Oyster cards on the go."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Top up your pay as you go credit and get notifications when it gets low","Check your journey history","See if you have incomplete journeys","Buy adult rate \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/travelcards-and-group-tickets\"\u003eTravelcards\u003c/a\u003e and \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/bus-and-tram-pass\"\u003eBus \u0026 Tram Passes\u003c/a\u003e valid between seven days and 12 months","Get notifications before your Travelcard and Bus \u0026 Tram Pass expires","Manage multiple season tickets and cards on the go"]}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Use the app if you get \u003ca href=\"/fares/free-and-discounted-travel\"\u003efree and discounted travel\u003c/a\u003e "]}

{"template":"image","link":{"image":{}},"image":{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/app-top-up.jpg","alt":"Pound sign pointing to an Oyster card, then 30 minutes on a clock, then the Oyster card touching a yellow card reader"},"wrapped":false}
If you have an older, first-generation Oyster card , you can't use it with the app.
You can replace it with a new Oyster card to use the app.
You can give us feedback on the app .
